headline: President Trump addresses world leaders—Davos CEO Brief for Wednesday, January 21, 2026
summary: WSJ Leadership Institute President Alan Murray recaps a pivotal day at the World Economic Forum in Davos, including President Trump’s highly anticipated address to political and business leaders and the key issues shaping the global agenda.

raw.headline: President Trump addresses world leaders—Davos CEO Brief for Wednesday, January 21, 2026
raw.summary: WSJ Leadership Institute President Alan Murray recaps a pivotal day at the World Economic Forum in Davos, including President Trump’s highly anticipated address to political and business leaders and the key issues shaping the global agenda.

headline: Ralph Lauren CEO: Why the Olympics Still Matter for Global Brands
summary: Ralph Lauren CEO Patrice Louvet speaks with the WSJ Leadership Institute’s Alan Murray about why moments like the upcoming Winter Olympics still bring people together—and how a quintessential American brand like Ralph Lauren maintains global appeal amid deglobalization and geopolitical fragmentation.

raw.headline: Ralph Lauren CEO: Why the Olympics Still Matter for Global Brands
raw.summary: Ralph Lauren CEO Patrice Louvet speaks with the WSJ Leadership Institute’s Alan Murray about why moments like the upcoming Winter Olympics still bring people together—and how a quintessential American brand like Ralph Lauren maintains global appeal amid deglobalization and geopolitical fragmentation.

headline: lululemon: Beware Of Turnaround Investing In Retail
summary: Competitive pressures and consumer trends are eroding lululemon athletica's pricing power. Click to read more on what investors should know about LULU stock.

raw.headline: lululemon: Beware Of Turnaround Investing In Retail

headline: The Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation to Open Fourth Center in the US with the University of Chicago Medicine Comprehensive Cancer Center
summary: NEW YORK, January 21, 2026--The Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation today announced it has awarded a grant to the University of Chicago Medicine Comprehensive Cancer Center to establish the UChicago Medicine Ralph Lauren Center, building on the Foundation’s commitment to expand or open five cancer centers across the United States. The UChicago Medicine Ralph Lauren Center will enhance access to high-quality cancer screening, comprehensive cancer care and support services, serving a catchment area
